item.title: ‘Mortal Kombat II’ Delays Release to Summer 2026
item.description: Karl Urban stars as Johnny Cage in Warner Bros.’ video game adaptation that was previously slated for this fall.

item.title: Karl Urban is a wise-cracking Johnny Cage in Mortal Kombat II
item.description: “I’m not some champion. I don’t have Transformer arms or shoot lightning bolts. I’m an actor.”

item.title: Johnny Cage Unleashes His Power of Being “Incredibly Handsome” in ‘Mortal Kombat II’ Trailer
item.description: Based on the popular video game, director Simon McQuoid’s follow-up to his 2021 feature hits theaters this fall.
